tool_description: Using this API, you can detect whether the images are NSFW or not, with a very high accuracy of up to 99%.
title: NSFW Detector

api_list.name: Detector image file
api_list.description:
Image must be a regular  **JPEG**  or  **PNG**  image.
Image size limit is **10MB**.
